overview: When hijab wearing Chloe Amour finds out that her boyfriend hasn't paid the rent she feels like it is her responsibility to step up and make things right with her landlord. Middle Eastern maid Violet Gems gets caught stealing money from her boss. He takes pity on her and gives her a choice; he can call the cops or she can give him some pussy! Middle Eastern hottie Vanessa Vox refuses to do her prayers. Instead, she'd rather make sexy videos for social media. Her boyfriend doesn't mind since he's the only one she fucks! Dania Vega will do anything to keep her stepbroher quiet about her poor grades. What she lacks in the classroom, she definitely makes up for in the bedroom!
title: Hijab Hookups
